patch.description: Updates specific field on an entity's template

requestBody.description:
Example: {"value":"2019-12-31"}

Date: "YYYY-MM-DD"

Decimal: 99.99

Integer: 1000

Password: "password"

Pull Down Menu: "pull down value"

Portal Object (all objects): [{"itemType":"Agreement","id":1}]

Text (Max 256 Characters): "text"

Text (Unlimited Characters): "text"

Yes/No (Checkbox): true/false

Multi Select Checkbox: ["value1","value2"]

Key/Value (all pairs): [{"key":"key1","value":"value1"},{"key":"key2","value":"value2"}]

Raiting: 5
